text: te loko sivaya, je te juthana hoya jemani sathe tamaro karara tha'i cukayo che, athava je tamari pase te paristhitimam ave ke tamari sathe yud'dha karavano irado nathi ane potana loko sathe pana yud'dha karavani iccha nathi ane jo allaha ta'ala icchato to te'one tamara para prabhutva api deto ane te'o tamari sathe cokkasa yud'dha karata, basa! Jo a loko tamarathi alaga rahe ane tamari sathe yud'dha na kare ane tamari pase santino sandesa mokale, to allaha ta'ala'e tamara mate te'o sathe lada'i babate ko'i marga nathi rakhyo
